items.name: Crossfit WorldWide Event
items.description: At the Crossfit WorldWide Event athletes at compete in workouts that they learn about hours or days beforehand, consisting mostly of an assortment of standard aerobic, weightlifting, and gymnastics movement.
items.question: สามารถซื้อสินค้าได้จากที่ไหน
